description: As a user I want to check that I lose the game waiting repeatedly, regardless of the location I am at.

elements.name: You will lose the game by waiting enough times at the location "outside the cafe"

steps.name: that I have started the game by navigating to "http://localhost:3000"
that I have navigated to the position "outside the cafe"
that my position is "outside the cafe"
I wait repeatedly until I die
my position should be "I died"

name: I lose the game by waiting

elements.name: Someone in the audience throws you a fiver

steps.name: that I have started the game by navigating to "http://localhost:3000"
that I have navigated to the position "at the concert"
that my position is "at the concert"
I wait long enough for the description to contain the text "jam with us"
I click on the button "Jam with the band"
your money inscreases to 15

elements.name: Receiveing a beer from the bartender

steps.name: that I have navigated to the position "in a crowded bar"
that my position is "in a crowded bar"
I wait long enough for the description to contain the text "The bartender offers you a can of beer for free"
my hipster bag should contain "a can of beer"

elements.name: I should give a beer to the barista

steps.name: that I have navigated to the position "inside the cafe"
that my position is "inside the cafe"
I wait long enough for the description to contain the text "if someone would just bring me a beer"
I click on the button "Give beer to barista"
my hipster bag should contain "nothing cool"

elements.name: Win the game a second time

steps.name: the description contain the text "He pours you a double espresso"
I click repeatedly button "Buy an espresso" until I win
my position should be "I won"

name: As a player I want to win the game a second time and doing so by taking anonter path.
